note.p: Landowner. Of Buckland House, Buckland, Berkshire. Justice of the peace and deputy lieutenant for Berkshire. Inherited the baronetcy in 1862. Kept Southdown sheep on his estate.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1260/26/21)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 27 September 2017)
